definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: Eva's wedding album holds only a faint glimmer of the wedding itself.
sentences.chinese: 埃娃的结婚相册仅仅保存了婚礼本身暗弱的影像。

sentences.english: It is like your future photo album.
sentences.chinese: 它就像是你未来的相册。

sentences.english: The second function of your album is allowing the user to click on a thumbnail and get a blown-up version of the photo.
sentences.chinese: 相册的第二项功能是允许用户单击缩略图来查看全图。

sentences.english: Looking through the Akashic records is like leafing through an infinite mental photo album.
sentences.chinese: 察看阿卡西记录就像翻阅一本无限的精神相册一样。

sentences.english: In the immediate aftermath of his death, the children made a dad-book of photos and drawings.
sentences.chinese: 得知父亲的死讯，孩子们做了一本爸爸相册和画册。

sentences.english: It will have a private web album section where pictures will be loaded.
sentences.chinese: 这将有一个私人网络相册里的图片部分将被加载。

sentences.english: I recommand this album in order to remind men sit in front computer to make yourself dressed well.
sentences.chinese: 借这个相册提醒电脑前的男士，注意打扮好自己。

sentences.english: Welcome to my online photo galleries.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎你访问我的网上相册。

sentences.english: Album cut from the 1989 XTC album Oranges & Lemons.
sentences.chinese: 从1989年XTC专辑橙子和柠檬切开的相册。

sentences.english: All user-entered album data is stored in XML.
sentences.chinese: 所有的用户输入的相册数据以XML形式储存。

sentences.english: Grab the tub of photos and start putting them in photo albums.
sentences.chinese: 把那些照片拿出来放进相册里吧。

sentences.english: Mash-up albums and videos have been a huge hit on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 嘻哈的相册和录像对互联网是个巨大的冲击。

sentences.english: More than half say they have replaced traditional photo albums with online photo-sharing services.
sentences.chinese: 超过一半妈妈称已经用网络相册代替传统像册。

sentences.english: His widow has now decided to sell it.
sentences.chinese: 现在他的寡妇决定将相册出售。

sentences.english: Traditional painting also is done in albums and on walls, lacquerwork, and other media.
sentences.chinese: 传统绘画也做了相册及在墙上，漆器，和其他媒体。

definition: head-and-shoulders photo (esp. a formal one used in a passport, ID card etc)
screensaver/abbr. for 屏幕保護程序|屏幕保护程序[ping2 mu4 bao3 hu4 cheng2 xu4]
